archimate:Requirement.name: SI-4(18): System Monitoring | Analyze Traffic and Covert Exfiltration
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Analyze outbound communications traffic at external interfaces to the system and at the following interior points to detect covert exfiltration of information: [Assignment: organization-defined interior points within the system].

properties.value: Organization-defined interior points include subnetworks and subsystems. Covert means that can be used to exfiltrate information include steganography.
